00014 namespace cupp {
00015 
00016 template <typename T>
00017 class memory1d;
00018 
00019 namespace deviceT {
00020 
00030 template< typename T, typename host_type=cupp::memory1d<T> >
00031 class memory1d {
00032         public:
00037                 typedef std::size_t size_type;
00038 
00043                 typedef T value_type;
00044 
00045 
00051                 memory1d ( size_type size, T* device_pointer) : device_pointer_(device_pointer), size_(size) {}
00052 
00056                 memory1d() : size_(0), device_pointer_(0) {}
00057                 
00063                 CUPP_RUN_ON_HOST CUPP_RUN_ON_DEVICE
00064                 size_type size() const;
00065 
00066 
00073                 CUPP_RUN_ON_DEVICE
00074                 T& operator[]( size_type size_type );
00075 
00082                 CUPP_RUN_ON_DEVICE
00083                 T const& operator[]( size_type index ) const;
00084 
00085         private:
00089                 T* device_pointer_;
00090 
00094                 size_type size_;
00095 
00096 }; // class memory1d
00097 
00098 
00099 template <typename T, typename host_type>
00100 T& memory1d<T, host_type>::operator[](size_type index) {
00101         return device_pointer_[index];
00102 }
00103 
00104 template <typename T, typename host_type>
00105 T const& memory1d<T, host_type>::operator[](size_type index) const {
00106         return device_pointer_[index];
00107 }
00108 
00109 
00110 template <typename T, typename host_type>
00111 typename memory1d<T, host_type>::size_type memory1d<T, host_type>::size() const {
00112         return size_;
00113 }
